name: Giant Air Elemental
description: The Giant Air Elemental embodies the power of wind and air, shaped as a large swirling mass with the ability to fly gracefully through the battlefield.
memorable: It can transform into a powerful whirlwind, carrying enemies and dealing damage.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through mobility and control of enemy placement.
relations: Often found in the company of other elemental beings or summoned by powerful mages.
environment: Typically found in open skies, stormy areas, or locations dense with elemental air energy.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and resistance to certain types of damage, making it durable.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Intelligence, making it vulnerable to physical challenges.
attacks: Can perform two slam attacks dealing significant bludgeoning damage and has a powerful whirlwind attack.
most_powerful_ability: Whirlwind mobilizes and damages enemies by carrying them off their feet.
additional_information: Can pass through very narrow openings without hindrance.
Does not require air, food, or sleep.
Can carry multiple small creatures or one large creature in its whirlwind form.
Immunities against various conditions such as grappled and paralyzed.
test_queries: large air monster with whirlwind powers
elemental that can fly and control enemies
massive creature made of wind and air
swift air elemental with powerful slam attacks
